string.value: #b#p2091002##k, the owner of the Peach Farm and the resident pharmacist at #b#m250000000##k. He seemed concerned about something...

#p2091002# seemed relieved that the #o6130207#s have been eliminated, but was very much concerned over the fact that they have already eaten most of the peaches at the farm. He was worried that the crop will be very low. He asked me to collect #b100 more #t4000282#s#k. \n\n#i4000282##t4000282# #b#c4000282##k/100
I gathered up #t4000282#s for him. NOW #p2091002# seemed to breathe the sigh of relief.
으음. 이걸로는 안 돼. 아무리 봐도 너무 적어. 이래서는 약을만들기도 어려울 텐데… 안녕하신가? 전에 #o6130207#을 퇴치해 준 사람이로군. 덕분에 과수원의 복숭아를 도둑맞는 일이 줄어들었다네. 정말 감사하게 생각해.
하지만 #o6130207#들이 따먹은 천도의 수가 워낙 많아서 천도 수확량이 확 줄어들 것 같아. 어떻게든 해결해야 하는데… 전에 #o6130207# 퇴치도 도와줬으니 한번만 더 도와줄 수 없을까?

Sigh, this isn't it. I simply don't have enough of it ... I can't make medicines out of this ... oh, hey! How have you been? Thanks for your work last time taking care of those darn #o6130207#s. You really helped decrease the number of peach thefts that occur here. I can't thank you enough for that.

The sad thing is, #o6130207#s already stole enough peaches to severly decrease the crop. I need to find a way to solve this sudden lack of crop. Well, you helped me eliminate those #o6130207#s last time; can you help me out once more?

I'd like for you to gather up #b100 #t4000282#s#k for me. The best way to increase the crop is by increasing the number of peach trees in the first place. I know it'll take some time, but that's probably the best long-term solution for this.
Busy? In that case ... this is just as big a problem as the monkeys stealing the peaches... is there anyone willing to help?
All 100 #t4000282#s!!! Once these grow into trees, I'll be able to reap in much more peaches than before! Thank you for your hard work!
Okay, now I'll have to plant the seeds. Hopefully these seeds will grow fast. This peach isn't just an ordinary peach: it's also used for medicinal purposes.
Sorry, but that's not enough #b#t4000282#s#k. #o6130207# plucked away so many peaches that I'll need #b100#k #t4000282#s.
